Reference

All functions

apply_graph_theme()

Apply multiple DiagrammeR global graph attributes

base30toNumeric() base36toNumeric() numericToBase30() numericToBase36()

Conversion between base10 and base30 & base36

cat0()

Concatenate to screen without spaces

dct_from_spreadsheet()

Import a DCT specification from a spreadsheet

dct_object()

Create a DCT object

dct_object_to_html()

Create an HTML fragment showing a DCT object

dct_object_to_yaml()

Convert a DCT object to YAML

dct_sheet_to_dct()

Create a DCT object from a DCT sheet

generate_dct_template() generate_dct_templates()

DCT templates

generate_id() generate_ids()

Generate unique identifier(s)

invert_id()

Invert identifier

load_dct_dir() load_dct_specs() print(<dct_specs>) plot(<dct_specs>)

Load DCT specifications from a file or multiple files

opts

Options for the psyverse package

generate_construct_overview() generate_definitions_overview() generate_instruction_overview()

Generate construct overviews and instruction overviews

parse_dct_specs()

Parse DCT specifications

read_spreadsheet()

Convenience function to read spreadsheet-like files

repeatStr()

Repeat a string a number of times

save_to_yaml()

Save a psyverse object or YAML character vector to a file

vecTxt() vecTxtQ()

Easily parse a vector into a character value

viewHTML()

Display HTML
